artist: Artist: David Rathman; Printer: Location Books, Minneapolis
creditline: The Eugene and Virginia Palmer Fund for Prints and Drawings
description: blue-grey cover with title in white embossed printing; reproductions of black and white ink and watercolor drawings of guns, tanks, airplanes and helicopters with a sentence unrelated to the image on each sheet
provenance: [Location Books, Minneapolis, until 2014; sold to MIA]
signed: on colophon page (last page), in black ink: [David Rathman]
title: In Quiet Rooms Young Girls are Writing Poetry
